title: New: King Nun – Speakerface
body:
**King Nun’s** Test Icicles channeling debut, _Tulip_, marked them as serious ones to watch for 2017, and the teenage Londoners have followed it up with another ferocious anthem in waiting.

Speakerface, picks up on the prime of the mid-00’s indie scene, we’re talking the likes of Dirty Pretty Things and Bloc Party, and injects it with the sort of memorable energy that will ensure they’ll be one of the most talked about acts of the next year. Check out a live version of Speakerface below, as well as the studio version below that.
